infoMsg1: Hello! I see you want to add the bot to your server. Follow the steps to to so
First, you must remember one thing, If you Kick/Remove Cryptonix X from your server, all previous settings, data, xp, etc... of all server members will be deleted
infoMsg2: Then, you need to invite the bot! Here's an invite link. https://discord.com/api/oauth2/authorize?client_id=628361998970650643&permissions=8&scope=bot
Once invited, use `!settings` to set up the bot. After, use `!help` to see all the available commands.
infoMsg3: Use !suggest <suggestion> if you have any suggestions or !bug <bug> if you found a bug. Thank you.
